title: Ep. 46 "We Growin & Ish"
description:
Can't believe we've been at this for over a year!!! Thanks for the support. Today we talk about the show's growth as well as our personal growth, whether Kiki is still out here single and confused and Medinah Monroe shares just how much she loves her man. Plus, Ma$e tried to holla and Kiki literally got her wig snatched.
